question: There are 119 second-graders at Sunny Hill School. 72 of them are girls. On Wednesday, 3 second-grade girls and 6 second-grade boys were absent. How many second grade boys were at Sunny Hill School on Wednesday?
answer:
Of the 119 second graders, 72 are girls, so 119 students - 72 girls = <<119-72=47>>47 boys.
On Wednesday there were 47 boys - 6 absent = <<47-6=41>>41 boys.
#### 41
